mapper.select: SELECT entry_apply_master.APLY_NO, COURSE_DIV, NAME_KOR, NAME_ENG, PIC_FILE_NO, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, ZIPCODE, ADDR_LOCAL, ADDR_DETAIL, TEL_LOCAL, HP_LOCAL, APLY_STS_DIV, APLY_DATE, ENTRY_APPLY_DOC.FILE_NO FROM entry_apply_master inner join ENTRY_APPLY_DOC ON entry_apply_master.APLY_NO = ENTRY_APPLY_DOC.APLY_NO AND entry_apply_master.RCRT_NO = ENTRY_APPLY_DOC.RCRT_NO WHERE entry_apply_master.aply_no = #{aplyNo} AND entry_apply_master.RCRT_NO = "J23C002"

SELECT ESI.ITEM_NO, ESI.ITEM_NAME, EAI.ANSWER, ESI.MAX_CHAR FROM entry_sel_intro AS ESI INNER JOIN entry_apply_intro AS EAI ON ESI.ITEM_NO = EAI.ITEM_NO AND ESI.RCRT_NO = EAI.RCRT_NO WHERE EAI.APLY_NO = #{aplyNo};
